participant_1.background:
I loved to play make believe in the woods behind my house.
My parents are supportive of my career as a translator.
I'm from the Midwest, where we drive big trucks and have big hands.
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
I like to make my own Christmas cards.

participant_2.background:
I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.
I wake up and greet my dog, the best friend I could ever ask for.
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
i could eat meatloaf every night and never get tired of it.

content.text: Hello! What's your favorite place to eat?
Hello! I haven't found my favorite place yet, but I'm always up for trying new things.
I love to try new places too. I used to live in the Midwest, where we drive big trucks and have big hands.
I've never been to the Midwest! I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! I loved playing make believe in the woods behind my house when I was a kid.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to play with my dog in the backyard.
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
Aww, that's too bad. I'm sure you'll give your new puppy a great home.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it. What do you do for a living?
I'm a translator. I really enjoy my job, and my parents are supportive of it.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like your job.
Thanks! I'm also a big fan of making my own Christmas cards. It's a fun way to get creative and show my appreciation for friends and family.
That sounds like a great hobby! I love making cards too.
It's really relaxing. I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! It's been nice talking to you.
It's been nice talking to you too
